name: Basic Marinara for the Instant Pot®
author: Bren
summary: This marinara sauce tastes like it's been simmering all day, but you'll have a savory, rich dish on the table in under an hour.
ingredients: freshly ground black pepper to taste
directions: Turn on a multi-functional pressure cooker (such as Instant Pot®) and select Saute function to heat the pot
Add olive oil and onion; cook until onion is translucent, 3 to 5 minutes
Add garlic and cook until fragrant, about 1 minute
Pour in red wine and simmer until reduced by half
Pour diced tomatoes and whole tomatoes into the pot
Stir in basil, oregano, parsley, salt, pepper, red pepper flakes, and bay leaf
Select Manual function and set timer for 10 minutes
Allow 10 to 15 minutes for the pressure to build
Release pressure carefully using the quick-release method according to manufacturer's instructions, about 5 minutes
Use an immersion blender to puree the sauce
